message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am offering you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional item for $750,000.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $700,000 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After reviewing your offer, I've decided to counter with a proposal of $725,000. This price reflects the value of the product while also considering your budget. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.
